selectedVerses.text: So Samson went and caught 300 foxes and took torches. And he turned them tail to tail and put a torch between each pair of tails.
They have tails and stings like scorpions, and their power to hurt people for five months is in their tails.
For the power of the horses is in their mouths and in their tails, for their tails are like serpents with heads, and by means of them they wound.
